attributes.action: to stick to his word and give the people what they want - Labour out!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: New Labour has no other agenda but to cling to power, it is about time they hear what the electorate want and hold a general election now  before the Labour party is ruined for all eternity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
